original_text: But he did not remove the altars on the hills. The people continued to offer sacrifices and to burn incense on those altars.
korean_text: 오직 산당은 제거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 그 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였고

sentences.original_text: But he did not remove the altars on the hills.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 언덕 위의 제단들을 제거하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The people continued to offer sacrifices
and to burn incense on those altars.
